text: Era temukkirizanga okugyako oyo ali ku ddiini yammwe, Ggwe Nabbi Muhammad () gamba nti: mazima obulungamu obwannamaddala bulungamu bwa Katonda, abaffe ekibakozesa ekyo lwakuba nti temwagala muntu mulala yenna kuweebwa ekiringa kyemwaweebwa (obwa Nabbi)! oba lwakutya nti bayinza okuvuganya nammwe ku lwekyo mumaaso ga Katonda (Ggwe Nabbi Muhammad () gamba nti mazima ebirungi biri mu mikono gya Katonda, abiwa oyo gwaba ayagadde, anti bulijjo Katonda mugazi nnyo era mumanyi mu buli kintu
